data.name: Dusit Thani Residence Davao
data.details: Dusit Thani Residence is a luxurious serviced apartment complex located in Davao City, Philippines. It is situated in the heart of the city's central business district, making it a convenient choice for travelers who are visiting for business or pleasure. The complex features a range of spacious and modern apartments, all of which are equipped with a range of amenities to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. These amenities include air conditioning, a flat-screen television, a fully equipped kitchen, and a private bathroom with a shower.
data.address: Stella Hizon Reyes Drive, Bo. Pampanga, 2b Maryknoll Dr, Buhangin, Davao City, 8000 Davao del Sur

comments.message: My experience at the hotel was great, and I'd definitely recommend it to others! The place is very clean, and the food is really good. I also liked their pool. The room were well-conditioned, and they had a nice selection of pillows.

data.name: Waterfront Insular Hotel Davao
data.details: The Waterfront Insular Hotel is a four-star hotel located in Davao City, Philippines. It is situated in the heart of the city's central business district, making it a convenient choice for travelers who are visiting for business or pleasure. The hotel features a range of guest rooms and suites, all of which are equipped with a range of amenities to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. These amenities include air conditioning, a flat-screen television, a minibar, and a private bathroom with a shower.
data.address: Davao-Agusan Highway Brgy. 12-B, Davao City, Mindanao 8000 Philippines

comments.message: I stayed at this hotel recently and I found it to be very clean, comfortable, and well-cared for. The room was very clean, and I loved the way it smelled when I walked in. The staff was also very friendly and helpful. They helped me check into my room promptly

comments.message: We had a great time at Anavada Apartment Inn, and we were impressed by how clean and well-kept it was. The room we stayed in was spacious, comfortable, and very well-lit. The bed was also very comfortable, and I slept well every night!

comments.message: The food was delicious—I especially loved the breakfast buffet they offered each morning! Their pool is beautiful, too—it's very relaxing to sit by it and read a book while taking in the view.

comments.message: The hotel also offers many amenities that make your stay more exciting: a pool with a waterfall running through it; a jacuzzi; and an awesome exercise room where you can work out in peace.
